text: The women's 100 metres hurdles event at the 2016 IAAF World U20 Championships was held at Zdzisław Krzyszkowiak Stadium on 22, 23 and 24 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |style="background:gold"|Gold|| Elvira Herman |- |style="background:silver"|Silver|| Rushelle Burton |- |style="background:#cc9966"|Bronze|| Tia Jones |} ==Records== {| class="wikitable" width=75% |- !colspan="5"|Standing records prior to the 2016 IAAF World U20 Championships in Athletics |- |World Junior Record | |12.83 |El Paso, TX, United States |30 April 2016 |- |Championship Record | |12.89 |Eugene, OR, United States |27 July 2014 |- |World Junior Leading | |12.83 |El Paso, TX, United States |30 April 2016 |- !colspan="5"|Broken records during the 2016 IAAF World U20 Championships in Athletics |- |Championship Record | |12.85 |Bydgoszcz, Poland |24 July 2016 |- |} ==Results== ===Final=== 24 July Start time: 16:04 Temperature: 25 °C Humidity: 61 % Wind: +2.0 m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
